Summary: Looked like a ball of light
divs: Sighting DetailsWe had just came home from watching the new super man movie and r family and friends were sitting outside waiting for my brother to start the fireworks. My husband looks to his left and sees a glowing red orange light and I say omg is that a firework and he says no I think ot is a air craft and as we start looking at it we notice it is not a airplane or firework it is nothing like we have ever seen. So after video taping it on his phone for a while it just disappears. We have seen a lot of strange activity lately and we live by he airport.i have lived here my whole life and never seen anything like it.
trends: There have been no other sightings in West Paducah
This sighting has never been favorited.
